sentences.sentence: You may notice redness and swelling after the injection.
Only occasionally did the telltale redness around his eyes betray the fatigue he was suffering.
sentences.translation: 只有在他眼周发红的时候才偶尔显出他有多么疲劳。

sentences.sentence: You get a rash, or a redness of the skin.
sentences.translation: 你会出皮疹，或者皮肤变红
